## Load Example

```{r}
x <- get_example()

x
```

## Place of Service

```{r}
search_pos(pos_code = x$pos)
```


## Categorize HCPCS

```{r}
search_descriptions(hcpcs_code = x$hcpcs)
```

```{r}
search_rbcs(hcpcs_code = x$hcpcs)
```
